QuestData.Title: Parting Ways
QuestData.Description:
Me don't know what fate be comin' for ol' Vol'jin... but it be waitin' for me in Ardenweald.
Ashamane, Hir'eek, Shadra... dey belong dere, too.
We best be gettin' outta here. Me had enough of da Maw for an eternity.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the lost loa and Vol'jin to the Winter Queen in Ardenweald.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ysera in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText:
It fills me with joy to know that the spirits lost to the Maw are safe once more.
None can say what fate has in store for Vol'jin. The path on which he has embarked has never before been walked by a mortal soul.
Yet whatever awaits him, know that your efforts are what made it possible.

Objectives.Objective: Loa delivered to the Winter Queen
